name: Radgost Web Lab
description:
We have been making simple, useful software since 2003. The majority of our customers are small and medium businesses, but we also completed projects for global enterprises such as Pepsi, Microsoft and Lay's.
Our commitment to producing high quality software has been recognized by many industry leaders: we were named Deloitte Rising Star & the fastest-growing technology company in Deloitte Fast 500 EMEA; we have won the Pirate Summit Award and competed in TechCrunch Disrupt Startup Battlefield in London.
Radgost Web Lab is a tight, effective team made up of experienced IT professionals and computer science graduates from the top Polish universities. We are committed to delivering projects that both we and you can be proud of.
